name: Dungeons & Potions
description:
Deeper into the Dungeon, deeper into the potions side effects!

You enter the Dungeon and try to go as deep as you can. On your way, you discover magical potions that can grant you the most powerful abilities, but will curse you with invasive side effects... Will you retrieve the treasure at the very bottom of this place?

A nice action-adventure game, with many enemies and abilities, as well as many environments, all made in three days!

Everything in this game has been made in the course of Ludum Dare 48, including:

  • All gameplay mechanics
  • All graphics
  • All musics
  • All sound effects

(the only exception being our logo splashscreen at the beginning)

Tools:

  • Game engine: Unity
  • Pixel art: GraphicsGale, GIMP
  • Music: Cubase

Changelog

v1.0

  • Game release at the end of the Ludum Dare.

v1.2

  • Tweaks on Armor and Sword Upgrades
  • Add delays to monsters before they can attack
  • Add WebGL Build to have the game embedded in the page !
  • Tweak hero hitbox
  • Prevent enemies from going offscreen to avoid progression blocker (safe kill mechanic)
  • Tweak some enemies stats and spawn rate
  • Make potion descriptions more meaningful (following some of your feedbacks)
  • Add back to main menu with Escape (in case something goes wrong)
  • Support for 4:3 screens for the .exe version
